session: NF2 Diagnostic Strategy - Buccal vs Blood

ectodermal_lineage.description: All models converge on shared ectodermal origin of buccal epithelium and neural tissues (NF2 target)
ectodermal_lineage.biological_basis: Neural crest and oral epithelium both derive from ectoderm in early gastrulation
ectodermal_lineage.diagnostic_implication: Mutations in ectodermal progenitors should be reflected in both tissues

timing_hypothesis.description: Timing of mutation emergence determines tissue distribution (pre- vs post-gastrulation)
timing_hypothesis.biological_basis: Early embryonic mutations appear in all lineages; post-differentiation mutations are tissue-restricted
timing_hypothesis.diagnostic_implication: Early NF2 mutations should show higher VAF in buccal than blood

blood_independence.description: Blood derives from mesoderm, independent of ectodermal lineage
blood_independence.biological_basis: Hematopoietic cells originate from mesodermal progenitors, not ectoderm
blood_independence.diagnostic_implication: Blood less likely to carry ectodermal-restricted mutations

vaf_enrichment.description: Variant allele frequency (VAF) should be higher in tissue closer to mutation origin
vaf_enrichment.biological_basis: Founder cell effect - earlier clones contribute more to final tissue composition
vaf_enrichment.diagnostic_implication: Buccal swabs may detect low-level mosaicism missed in blood

diagnostic_framework.central_hypothesis: Buccal swabs superior to blood for NF2 mosaicism detection due to shared ectodermal lineage
diagnostic_framework.mechanism: Early post-zygotic NF2 mutations in ectodermal progenitors → enrichment in neural and buccal tissues, but not mesodermal blood
testable_predictions: Higher VAF in buccal vs blood for same individual with mosaic NF2
Detection of mutations in buccal samples negative in blood
Correlation between buccal VAF and clinical severity (neural tissue burden)
diagnostic_framework.clinical_application: First-line genetic screening: buccal swab → reduces false negatives in mosaic NF2
validation_needed: Embryological timing data for NF2 mutation window
Comparative VAF studies (buccal vs blood in confirmed NF2 mosaicism)
Neural crest contribution to buccal epithelium (lineage tracing)
Clinical diagnostic yield comparisons in literature
